Query.Select: *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell' or @Name='PowerShell'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0 or Level=5) and (EventID=4104) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 2592000000]]]

*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell' or @Name='PowerShell'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0 or Level=5) and (EventID=4104) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 2592000000]]]

*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell' or @Name='PowerShell'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0 or Level=5) and (EventID=4104) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 2592000000]]]

*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell' or @Name='PowerShell'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0 or Level=5) and (EventID=4104) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 2592000000]]]
